name: unified-health-platform
description: UnifiedHealth Global Platform - Multi-Currency, Multi-Region, AI-Powered Healthcare Ecosystem
author: UnifiedHealth Global

scripts.test:api:smoke: cd tests/api && pnpm vitest run smoke/
scripts.test:api:contracts: cd tests/api && pnpm vitest run contracts/
scripts.test:api:integration: cd tests/api && pnpm vitest run integration/
scripts.test:api:regression: cd tests/api && pnpm vitest run regression/
scripts.test:ui: cd tests/ui && pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.test:ui:smoke: cd tests/ui && pnpm exec playwright test specs/smoke/
scripts.test:ui:web: cd tests/ui && pnpm exec playwright test --project=web-chromium
scripts.test:ui:admin: cd tests/ui && pnpm exec playwright test --project=admin-chromium
scripts.test:ui:provider: cd tests/ui && pnpm exec playwright test --project=provider-chromium
scripts.test:ui:kiosk: cd tests/ui && pnpm exec playwright test --project=kiosk-chromium
scripts.test:ui:a11y: cd tests/ui && pnpm exec playwright test specs/accessibility/
scripts.test:ui:visual: cd tests/ui && pnpm exec playwright test specs/visual/
scripts.test:ui:headed: cd tests/ui && pnpm exec playwright test --headed
scripts.test:ui:debug: cd tests/ui && pnpm exec playwright test --debug
scripts.test:report: pnpm exec allure generate reports/allure-results -o reports/allure-report --clean && pnpm exec allure open reports/allure-report
scripts.test:report:ui: cd tests/ui && pnpm exec playwright show-report
scripts.security:pr: pnpm security:audit && pnpm security:agent && pnpm security:abuse-tests
scripts.security:all: pnpm security:audit && pnpm security:secrets && pnpm security:agent && pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck
scripts.sbom:generate: echo 'Use CI pipeline or run: bash scripts/generate-sbom.sh (requires Syft)'
scripts.qa:pr: pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test:unit && pnpm test:smoke
scripts.qa:full: pnpm qa:pr && pnpm test:regression && pnpm test:perf
